snippet: The Russians took the gold medal at the world team championship, with China winning the silver and Ukraine the gold.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column notes Russia's gold medal win at the World Team Chess Championship.
lead_paragraph: The Russians took the gold medal at the world team championship, with China winning the silver and Ukraine the gold.

headline.main: Russia Wins Team Title Despite Loss to the U.S.
headline.print_headline: Russia Wins Team Title Despite Loss to the U.S.
